text: 2074 (MMLXXIV) will be . == Events == * January 10 - 150th anniversary of the Columbia Pictures. * February - 100th anniversary of The Stone Pony. * April 17 - 150th anniversary of the Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. * December - 100th anniversary of The Towering Inferno. * 100th anniversary of The Stranger and the Fog. Category:2070s
